document_data.name: Ambral Isle
document_data.region: [[Sea of Fallen Stars]]Though it is never outright stated to be there, ''Elminster in Myth Drannor'' strongly suggests that it is, as the elven princess who dies in the Sea of Fallen Stars finds her possessions washing ashore at Ambral Island. Given it is an inland sea, it is extremely unlikely for the island to be elsewhere, and thus this article is written as though Ambral Isle was in the Sea of Fallen Stars. Later sources may contradict this in the future.
document_data.mainbody: '''Ambral Isle''' was an island in the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]].
document_data.History: At some point before the founding of [[Waterdeep]], Princess [[Elvandaruil]]'s bracelet washed ashore after a flight spell failed on her.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Jokes at the expense of the intelligence of the inhabitants were common among the inhabitants of the [[Dragonmere]], the [[Dales]], and the [[Vast]].{{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2007)/20-06 Jokes}}
document_data.Inhabitants: * [[Arguth]], a mage of the 3{{rd}} century [[DR]].{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor|354, 356|Epilogue}}
